column1: Bramsche is a town in the district of Osnabrück
column3: Germany. It is about 20 kilometres (12 miles) north of Osnabrück

column1: In 1971/72 12 previously independent municipalities were included into the town.
Kalkriese - site of the Battle of the Teutoburg Forest
The mayor of Bramsche is Heiner Pahlmann (SPD). He was elected in May 2014 with 63
column2: 0 % of the votes. His predecessor Liesel Höltermann (SPD) did not run for mayor any more.
